name: SRB2 Message Board Dark Mode Fix
description:
Fixes the "Character" Dark mode to be
 - More consistently padded
 - Actually dark (no more white on orange)
 - A little more consistently themed
additional_info:
You give me a lot of credit thinking I'm gonna version this shit

(V2 Lol)

Got rid of as many icky gradients and background panels as possible, took a shot at theming more of the bits I didn't before.
